title: The Block's hot tradie Paul Taouk revealed as hunky Instagram model
text:
The Block's El'ise and Matt Bothe were forced to pause their renovation this week.

Despite the couple now racing against time to complete their townhouse, El'ise took a break to expose joiner Paul Taouk's 'big secret' on Tuesday night.

Unexpectedly, the 33-year-old revealed their hardworking tradie has been hiding the fact he is a popular Instagram model with thousands of fans.

Who knews! During Tuesday's episode of The Block, El'ise Bothe revealed their 'hot tradie' Paul Taouk (pictured) is secretly a popular Instagram model with thousands of fans

'Pauly's got 14,000 Instagram followers!' exclaimed El'ise while looking at his profile.

She then proceeded to swoon over his very revealing selfies, while showing both foreman Keith Schleiger and husband Matt his profile.

'We're supposed to be renovating, I don't want to look at that,' responded Keith.

'Pauly's got 14,000 Instagram followers!' exclaimed El'ise (pictured) while looking at his profile

Hot stuff! El'ise then proceeded to swoon over his very revealing selfies (pictured), while showing both foreman Keith Schleiger and husband Matt his profile

However, moments later Keith decided to strip off in a bid to prove Paul isn't the only tradesman hiding a muscular body under their hi-visibility clothing on the show.

'I said to Keith, "You too can become Insta-famous if you get your rig out like Pauly",' explained El'ise, as the men both stood shirtless.

Keith said: 'This is the most embarrassing moment of my career.'

He's not shy! Paul's profile is full of very revealing selfies flaunting his muscles

Hunks! Foreman Keith Schleiger (right) stripped off next to Paul on Tuesday to prove he's equally as buff

Raunchy episode! El'ise's husband Matt later joined in with the shirtless action

Later in the episode, Paul had some competition as 'delivery boy' Dalton Ford arrived at the Oslo as part of a promotional visit for sponsors, A2 Milk.

Dalton, who has 56,000 Instagram followers, kept his t-shirt on throughout while whipping up milkshakes for the workers.

That didn't stop the teams swooning over him, with El'ise revealing she has followed the hunk on Instagram for quite some time.

The Block's next top model! Later in the episode, Paul had some competition as 'delivery boy' Dalton Ford (pictured) arrived at the Oslo as part of a promotional visit for sponsors, A2 Milk
description: The Block's El'ise and Matt Bothe were forced to pause their renovation this week.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
